main: ^Hey, look what I found! Is this your guitar?
^No way, that's it! Thank you so much; I can't believe you found it.
^I'm glad we found it just in time.
^You don't know how much this guitar means to me. I've had it for so many years!
^I'm just happy we found it. You must be relieved.
^You know, I feel like I owe you one. Is there anything I can do for you?
^No, really. I insist. Stop being so humble.
^Oh, I have the perfect thing for you to unwind.
^There's an upcoming concert we have. Will you come?
^Yes, I'll be playing at the SMC Stadium. Give me your number, and I'll send you all the details.
^I'll definitely be there. Thanks for the invite!
